entry.title: Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (20)
entry.content:
Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (20)20140508
I did two series today in about an hour. These were really tense
races, as opposed to last night which were much more relaxed. I
barely one the last  Supercar Festival race because I crashed near
the end, but I drove over some grass, crashed into the next guy,
and got ahead by about 0.002 seconds. It was intense.

International B - 37% - 45 - 286 - 34 - 176 - 98 - $2.525mil

Total time: 28:42
  • Video Games
  • Gran Turismo 6
  • PS3
  • 2013

entry.title: Movie: Captain America, starring Chris Evans (2011) (2)
entry.content:
Movie: Captain America, starring Chris Evans (2011) (2)20140508
My wife and I watched this again in preparation for taking her to
see the second movie. It was very fun and I enjoy how wholesome
Captain America is. I nearly cried when he jumped on the grenade in
the beginning. I almost noticed Margarey from Game of Thrones in
the movie! She was the vixen that kissed Captain A!
  • Movies
  • 2011

entry.title: Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (19)
entry.content:
Game: Gran Turismo 6 (PS3, 2013) (19)20140507
I played today for about an hour and did two series. I drove the
Mercedes and the Corvette. The Corvette Z06 LM Race Car feels SO
good to drive.

International B - 35% - 45 - 268 - 34 - 170 - 92 - $2.289mil

Total time: 27:47

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 11 - Confessions
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 11 - Confessions20140506
Walt is amazing. I knew that Walt and Jesse would hug
eventually. Where is Holly during the day?
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 12 - Rabid Dog
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 12 - Rabid Dog20140506
They love showing Walt in his undies. Walt is so devious in all
his plans. That's funny that Badger was talking about Babylon 5
for hours. I wish in the conversation with Skyler, Walt could
explain that he loves Jesse like a son. Yikes! Hank! That was so
close. It's great listening to Jesse talk about Walter: "He's the
Devil! Whatever you think is going to happen, the exact opposite
is going to happen." It's crazy that Walt wasn't really going to
kill Jesse.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 13 - To'hajiilee
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 13 - To'hajiilee20140506
Todd seems like a sweet guy... a bit naive though. Saul's line,
"Don't drink and drive, but if you do, call me!" That was a
brilliant move on Jesse's end.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 14 - Ozymandias
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 14 - Ozymandias20140506
The craziest thing about these flashbacks is that Walt looks so
weird with normal hair. In the future, he has a totally different
kind of crazy mountain man hair.

Yikes! No more Hank AND Walt lost his money.

Yikes! Walt laying that about Jane on Jesse. That's brutal.

Yikes! Jesse being enslaved to make meth. That's terrible. I
suppose he's not dead.

Yikes!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 15 - Granite State
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 15 - Granite State20140506
Walter's new life is very interesting. I wonder what he'll do
with it. We know from the flash-forwards that he goes back to New
Mexico, but I wonder how long it takes... not long to try to
leave apparently... It's crazy that there are only two episodes
left. There must be a huge time leap in the second one to make up
for everything.

Oh man, I can't believe what they did to Andrea.

Walt is so lonely and sad.

I guess they could trace his call very quickly.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 16 - Felina
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 16 - Felina20140506
Walt is so devious. Ah, Walt bought the crazy gun to save
Jesse. I feel like Walt must have put the ricin in the
Stevia. Walter is so awesome the way he saved Jesse.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 16A - The Ring
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 16A - The Ring20140506
I feel like the whole point of this episode is to re-introduce the
Big Bad for the season (Wolfram & Hart) and get ready for the
final arc. The details of the episode are kind cool too. The
gladiatorial thing is neat.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 8 - Gliding Over All
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 8 - Gliding Over All20140505
Lydia's plan is interesting and her skirt was very cute. I wonder
when Walt will come back with the ricin. I knew it! That was a
fun montage, but I wish we had a better sense of how long it
took. (Apparently they read my mind, because they said 3 months.)
That was an impressive pile. It's crazy how scared Jesse is of
Walt. Yikes!
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 9 - Blood Money
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 9 - Blood Money20140505
Hank's experience was very disorienting for me. It's kind of cute
that Walt is getting more involved in the business and is very
active about it. Yikes.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 10 - Buried
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 10 - Buried20140505
Huel is so funny. This is turning out to be an insane resolution.

  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Games of Thrones - Season 4 - Episode 5 - First of His Name
entry.content:
Games of Thrones - Season 4 - Episode 5 - First of His Name20140505
That's some yikes about the Vale. I like that Arya says her kill
list each night before bed. Sansa's aunt is crazy. Arya's life is
so interesting... lessons in life with The Hound. It's amazing
how close Bran and Arya came to seeing their brothers. Wow... the
way Jon killed the leader.
  • TV Shows
  • Games of Thrones

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 6 - Buyout
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 6 - Buyout20140504
That was a somber opening. That was rad about Mike and Gomez. 

I like Jesse's logic, "Are we in the meth business or the money
business?" I think that 5 million is a huge amount and way more
than Walter ever thought he would need or want. It's sad to think
that Walter had opportunities to get out and didn't take
them. However, I don't expect the sale to work.

It's amazing how good Jesse is compared to Walter when in the
beginning is was so clearly the opposite.

Walter's escape plan was amazing.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 7 - Say My Name
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 7 - Say My Name20140504
Oh man. That was a great opening. Mike is very thorough. I like
that Walt just wants to be the best at something. I thought that
safety deposit boxes and their rooms were protected while someone
was there... shouldn't Gomez need a search warrant? Saul's drawer
full of cell phones is awesome. It's sad that Mike was right
before Walt shot him down.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 15A - The Prodigal
entry.content:
Buffy & Angel - Season 4 - Episode 15A - The Prodigal20140504
It's very sad that Kate and Angel can't find the right way to be
nice to each other. I really like Kate's character. It's fun, as
well, to learn more about Angel's early life.
  • TV Shows
  • Buffy & Angel

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 4 - Fifty-One
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 4 - Fifty-One20140503
Walt is very unwise sometimes. Lydia is crazy wound up. That was
an intense conversations between Walt and Skyler. I like Mike
calling himself "sexist" for not wanting to kill Lydia. The final
shot made it seem like the watch was a bomb.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad

entry.title: Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 5 - Dead Freight
entry.content:
Breaking Bad - Season 5 - Episode 5 - Dead Freight20140503
Oh man, that is LOW of Walter to abuse Hank like that. I like
that Jesse has his own ideas and isn't just Walt's
assistant. It's cool to have seen him grow over the span of the
show. This train heist is very cool. I wondered what that kid
being there was going to be about. I'm surprised it was Todd who
pulled the trigger.
  • TV Shows
  • Breaking Bad
